monthly_meetings.name: February Monthly Meeting
monthly_meetings.agenda: Guest lecture on 'Recent Discoveries in Exoplanet Research' followed by a Q&A session.

monthly_meetings.name: March Monthly Meeting
monthly_meetings.agenda: Workshop on 'Astrophotography Tips and Techniques' with hands-on demonstrations.

stargazing_events.name: Winter Constellation Stargazing
stargazing_events.agenda: Observing the Orion Nebula and the Pleiades cluster.

stargazing_events.name: Spring Equinox Stargazing
stargazing_events.agenda: Viewing the spring constellations and the planet Jupiter.
